articles.author: Katia Riddle
articles.title: TikTok bans #SkinnyTok. But content promoting unhealthy eating persists - NPR
articles.description: The social media platform TikTok recently banned a hashtag called #SkinnyTok after European regulators warned it was promoting extreme weight loss. But eliminating this kind of content is not easy.
articles.content: The social media platform TikTok recently banned a hashtag called #SkinnyTok after European regulators warned it was promoting unrealistic body images and extreme weight loss.The company had seen an … [+6392 chars]

articles.author: European Academy of Neurology
articles.title: Simple insulin resistance test may also predict cognitive decline in Alzheimer's patients - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Insulin resistance detected by routine triglyceride-glucose (TyG) index can flag people with early Alzheimer's who are four times more likely to present rapid cognitive decline, according to new research presented at the European Academy of Neurology (EAN) Co…
